授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to learn how to motivate English learners effectively as motivation is regarded as the primary determinant on whether learners keep studying and achieve their goals. You will learn motivational strategies derived from some mainstream motivational theories and how to utilize those theories for down-to-earth practices in language classrooms.
到達目標:
1. You will be familiarized with the principles of motivational language teaching.
2. You will be able to develop ways to apply motivational strategies to the teaching contexts in Japanese secondary schools.
3. You will be able to increase their awareness of teaching and learning English through deep analysis of their personal learning experience.
4. You will be able to improve their English skills, especially expressing their ideas in presentations, discussions and essay writing.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
- Information for students permitted to take classes online: You will attend a in-class zoom session every week.
- It's desirable to have a computer/tablet with you to participate in in-class sessions as all the materials will be provided online.
